items.title: Stranger Things
items.overview: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces in order to get him back.

items.title: Inception
items.overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

items.title: Breaking Bad
items.overview: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

items.title: The Shawshank Redemption
items.overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

items.title: Friends
items.overview: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something-year-old friends living in Manhattan.
